books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the strange death of Gen. George S. Patton in December 1945.
books.name: KILLING PATTON

books.author: by Lena Dunham
books.description: A collection of revealing and often humorous personal essays from the creator and star of “Girls.”
books.name: NOT THAT KIND OF GIRL

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Steven Johnson
books.description: A history of innovation focused on the development of six key technologies of modern life; the companion volume to a PBS series.
books.name: HOW WE GOT TO NOW

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: Scientific (but often humorous) answers to hypothetical questions, based in part on the author’s website, xkcd.com.
books.name: WHAT IF?

books.author: by Steven Pinker
books.description: The Harvard psychologist and linguist updates the rules of writing with a more relaxed approach to grammar.
books.name: THE SENSE OF STYLE

books.author: by Mitchell Zuckoff with members of the Annex Security Team
books.description: Six C.I.A. contract employees discuss their experience during the attack on the State Department compound and the C.I.A. station called the “annex” in Benghazi in 2012.
books.name: 13 HOURS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by S. C. Gwynne
books.description: The life and career of the Confederate general Stonewall Jackson.
books.name: REBEL YELL

books.author: by David Limbaugh
books.description: The lawyer and political commentator uses his legal training to evaluate, and affirm, the truthfulness of the Bible.
books.name: JESUS ON TRIAL

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was shot to death in Texas in February.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Henry Kissinger
books.description: The elder statesman offers a view of how to build an international order in today’s world.
books.name: WORLD ORDER

books.author: by Richard Preston
books.description: The discovery of the Ebola virus, and the efforts to keep it from spreading; first published in 1994.
books.name: THE HOT ZONE

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET
